title: Mysteries of the Past: Shadow of the Daemon [Wendy99] ~ Maraya21
description:
Mysteries of the Past: Shadow of the Daemon (HOG) ~ Maraya21
 
https://s19.postimg.org/srryurmtv/Mysteries+of+the+Past+SoD.jpg

A father and son holiday trip has turned into a missing persons' case after they visit a remote mountain chalet and aren't heard from again. Strange forces seem to have brought you to this dark and secretive place to uncover the truth. As you delve deeper, you start to uncover an intriguing trail that seems to link the disappearances with an ancient and shadowy presence that curses the nearby forest.

Features:
- Be a paranormal detective and solve the case
- Complete challenges, puzzles, and mini-games
- Compelling soundtrack and a bonus chapter
- Explore beautiful, hand drawn locations

System Requirements:
OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
CPU: 1.6 GHz Pentium 4 or equivalent
RAM: 1024MB
DirectX: 9.0
Storage: 850 MB available space


Torrent dead? __ Torrent DMCA'ed? __  You have a problem with the game/file not working/opening? __ There is a game you desire to play like crazy but is not uploaded?

Please be aware that i want to seed 24h/d, however with a really old laptop, a connection of U:80.0 kB/s and multiple seeds
